title: Pixel 3 XL not turning on after dropping
content:
My Pixel 3XL was was turned on and had full battery. It dropped suddenly, back battery cover broken, and turned off.

Now I it is not turning on. It looks like there is no issue with the screen.

If I connect with original charger it is not charging and no red/green light and nothing on screen appears. 
What can I do now?
